summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Fair Employment Practices and to Open Housing and Public Accommodations, raising the limit on damages for humiliation and mental suffering from One Thousand Dollars ($1,000.00) to Ten Thousand Dollars ($10,000.00) in conformance with the Washington State Law Against Discrimination; and amending Seattle Municipal Code (SMC) Chapter 14.04 (Seattle Fair Employment Practices Ordinance) and SMC Chapter 14.08 (Open Housing and Public Accommodations Ordinance) by amending SMC sections 14.04.140, 14.04.150, 14.04.160, 14.04.180, 14.08.160, and 14.08.180.
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
